Intro: Welcome to Aviation API. This application is currently under development. Please see below for available test routes.

POST.info: Generates a new API key and sends the new key to the email included with the request. For testing, the rate limit is set to 10 requests per 15 minutes.

errors.400: Email is not present or email is invalid.

GET /flights.info: Currently shows Lufthansa and other Star Alliance flights

errors.400: API key is missing or api_key is misspelled.
errors.401: The API key sent is invalid.
errors.429: You have exceeded the rate limit.

required params.airport: Airport IATA code (3 characters, e.g. 'SFO' => San Francisco International Airport). Currently available for request: SFO, LAX and SXM.

GET /airports.info: Returns a list of destinations with non-stop flights to target airport. Data returned does not include seasonal flights at the moment.

Current routes.Error format: { status: 4XX, error: 'General error name', message: 'Descriptive error message'}
